mapper.select: SELECT f.favoritew_no , f.favoritew_reg_date , w.with_pet_no , w.building , w.road , w.tel , f.nickname FROM favoritew f JOIN with_pet w ON f.with_pet_no = w.with_pet_no WHERE f.nickname=#{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(1)FROM favoritew WHERE nickname=#{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT with_pet_no FROM favoritew WHERE nickname=#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT favoritew_no, favoritew_reg_date, with_pet_no, building, road, tel, nickname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rn, f.favoritew_no, f.favoritew_reg_date, w.with_pet_no, w.building, w.road, w.tel, f.nickname FROM favoritew f JOIN with_pet w ON f.with_pet_no = w.with_pet_no WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageMaker.cri.pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} * #{pageMaker.cri.amount} ) AND f.nickname = #{nickname} ) WHERE rn > ( ( #{pageMaker.cri.pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} - 1 ) * #{pageMaker.cri.amount} )
